# Chaotic Vitality, Mass (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] \[[[Chaotic Spells|chaotic]]]

**Level:** [[6th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 6]], [[6th Level Druid Spells|Druid 6]], [[6th Level Oracle Spells|Oracle 6]], [[6th Level Shaman Spells|Shaman 6]], [[6th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 6]], [[6th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 12th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 12]], [[BoXM 12th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 12]], [[BoXM 12th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 12]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. +5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** You and one creature/level, neither of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Deep Magic (Kobold Press), pg. 144

This spell functions like *[[Chaotic Vitality (Spell)|chaotic vitality]]* except that this spell affects multiple creatures. You only roll on the chart once; this roll affects all targets that fail their save.
